level.text: Civil fines, penalties, and fees may be imposed as additional sanctions for any infraction of this chapter pursuant to D.C. Official Code §§ 2-1801.01 et seq.
Adjudication of any infraction of this chapter shall be pursuant to D.C. Official Code §§ 2-1801.01 et seq.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 56 DCR 8837 (November 13, 2009).
